results.name: Optimization: Batch Operations
results.details: Individual episode storage → Implement batchStore() for episodes, skills. Impact: High - 5-10x faster bulk inserts, Effort: Medium

results.name: Optimization: Caching Layer
results.details: No query result caching → Add LRU cache for frequent searches. Impact: Medium - 2-5x faster repeated queries, Effort: Low

results.name: Optimization: Embedding Generation
results.details: Synchronous embedding for each episode → Async queue with batching. Impact: High - 3-5x faster for bulk operations, Effort: Medium

results.name: Optimization: Index Optimization
results.details: Basic SQLite indexes → Add covering indexes for common queries. Impact: Medium - 2-3x faster complex queries, Effort: Low

results.name: Optimization: RuVector Integration
results.details: Optional, platform-specific → Auto-fallback chain: RuVector → HNSW → Linear. Impact: High - 150x faster search when available, Effort: Low (already implemented)

results.name: Optimization: Connection Pooling
results.details: Single database connection → Connection pool for concurrent operations. Impact: High - Better concurrency, Effort: Medium

results.name: Optimization: Browser Bundle
results.details: 22 KB gzipped with all features → Code splitting for optional features. Impact: Low - Already optimized, Effort: High

results.name: Optimization: ReasoningBank
results.details: Pattern storage and search → Add pattern consolidation, auto-pruning. Impact: Medium - Better memory efficiency over time, Effort: Medium

metrics.impact: Medium - Better memory efficiency over time
